page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ - Peter Hanssens
page.description: Peter is an AWS Serverless Hero and the organizer of Sydney Serverless meetup as well as 5 data engineering meetups across Australia. He is passionate about the intersection of serverless and data engineering and his day job includes running two cloud consultancies, Cloud Shuttle, a community focussed data engineering consultancy, and cloudseeder which implements best practice AWS implementations for its clients. In his spare time he coaches his son’s soccer team.

organiser.name: Peter Hanssens
organiser.title: Founder, Cloud Shuttle and cloudseeder
